message: The answers that are generated by the model are not relevant to the questions.
The answer relevance metric threshold could be set to a very high value.

If the answer relevance threshold is set to a higher value, it can be identified by analyzing the question and answer values of the violated transactions and determining if the answers are not relevant. You can find the new threshold value through and change the value in your configuration settings.
The answers that are generated by the model are relevant to the questions.
The answer relevance metric threshold could be set to a very low value.

If the answer relevance metric threshold is set to a lower value, it can be identified by analyzing the question and answer values of the transactions with high metric values and determining if the answers are relevant. You can find the new threshold value and change the value in your configuration settings.
The contexts that are retrieved from the retrieval system are not relevant to the questions.
The contexts that are retrieved are not relevant due to issues with the retrieval system.
The context relevance metric threshold could be set to a very high value.

If the context relevance is low due to issues with the retrieval system, it can be identified by analyzing the context and question values of the violated transactions and determining if the contexts are not relevant. Issues with the retrieval system could include the document corpus not having the relevant data or the retrieval search failing to return the relevant data due to errors with model embedding or the chunking mechanism. Try changing the model embedding or chunking parameters to resolve issues.

If the context relevance metric threshold is set to a higher value, it can be identified by analyzing the context and question values of the violated transactions and determining if the contexts are not relevant. You can find the new threshold value and change the value in your configuration settings.
The contexts that are retrieved from the retrieval system are relevant to the questions.
The context relevance metric threshold could be set to a very low value.

If the context relevance metric threshold is set to a lower value, it can be identified by analyzing the context and question values of the transactions with high metric values and determining if the contexts are relevant. You can find the new threshold value and change the value in your configuration settings.
The answers that are generated by the model are not faithful or grounded to the provided contexts.
The model doesn't use the information that's specified in the provided context to generate the answer and uses its own training data knowledge.
The faithfulness metric threshold could be set to a very high value.

If the model did not use the context information, it can be identified by analyzing the context and answer values of the violated transactions and determining if the answers are not faithful. You can update the model prompt with additional instructions to ground the answer based on the context only. If the violations exist after you update the prompt instructions, try using a different model.

If the faithfulness threshold is set to a higher value, it can be identified by analyzing the context and answer values of the violated transactions and determining if the answers are not faithful. You can find the new threshold value and change the value in your configuration settings.
The answers that are generated by the model are faithful or grounded to the provided contexts.
The faithfulness metric threshold could be set to a very low value.

If the faithfulness metric threshold is set to a lower value, it can be identified by analyzing the context and answer values of the transactions with high metric values and determining if the answers are faithful. You can find the new threshold value and change the value in your configuration settings.
The model did not answer the question based on relevant information in the context, but it uses information that is not relevant to the question.

If the model uses context information that is not relevant to the question, you can identify the irrelevant context information by analyzing the context and answer values of the violated transactions. The information could be irrelevant because the context contained irrelevant data which can happen due to retrieval of more chunks or due to large chunk sizes. If the issue exists after you fix the provided contexts, try using a different model.
The model is unable to answer the questions with the provided context.
The model could be unable to answer due to issues with the retrieval system or the model.
Please analyse the unsuccessful requests transactions along with the Retrieval and Answer quality metrics to understand your results better.
